content:
I do not have personal experiences or preferences, but i can suggest some vintage/thrift shops that might be worth checking out in porto alegre based on the reviews and ratings available online:

1. brechó municipal - a municipal marketplace selling used clothes, shoes, and accessories.
2. armazém do passado - a vintage store offering clothing, accessories, and décor items.
3. bazar vintage - a stylish and fashion-forward store selling vintage and retro clothing and accessories.
4. casa da sogra - a thrift store specializing in retro and vintage home decor, furniture, and accessories.
5. pinga do brechó - a vintage and thrift store with a variety of clothing items, accessories, and kitchenware.

please note that i have not personally visited any of these shops, so it is always a good idea to read reviews and check the store's website or social media before visiting.
